snippet: Jeremy Corbyn, the new leader of Britain’s opposition party, again risked the wrath of royalists when he swore an oath of loyalty to Queen Elizabeth II, but apparently not on bended knee.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Corbyn, the new leader of Britain’s opposition party, again risked the wrath of royalists when he swore an oath of loyalty to Queen Elizabeth II, but apparently not on bended knee.

headline.main: Labour Leader Jeremy Corbyn Pledges Loyalty to Queen, if Not to Tradition
headline.print_headline: Labour Leader Pledges Loyalty To Queen, if Not to Tradition

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: Elizabeth II, Queen of Great Britain
